Parameters: AccessibilityService.MagnificationController: the magnification controller This value must never be null.
Region: the magnification region This value must never be null.
float: the new X coordinate, in unscaled coordinates, around which magnification is focused
float: the new Y coordinate, in unscaled coordinates, around which magnification is focused
onMagnificationChanged(android.accessibi.Description: Called when the magnified region, scale, or center changes.
onMagnificationChanged(android.accessibi.FullName: public abstract void onMagnificationChanged (AccessibilityService.MagnificationController controller, Region region, float scale, float centerX, float centerY)

ClassDesc: Listener for changes in the state of magnification.
